firm.name: 3.	(TSPL) Trimex Sands Private Limited Srikakulam. Andhrapradesh

milestones.description: 1	Published a research paper entitled “Beneficiation Of Beach Sands Minerals Of Trimex Sands Private Limited, Srikakulam , Andhrapradesh ” at the International  Seminar on MPT (2011) Mineral Processing Technology , Udaipur, Rajasthan .Authors: Ratnakar Bo
milestones.source_description: International  Seminar on MPT (2011) Mineral Processing Technology , Udaipur, Rajasthan .Authors: Ratnakar Bonda,

milestones.description: 3	Published a research paper entitled “Recovery of Iron Values of Low Grade Ore by Jigging” at International Seminar on 6th Indian Steel Summit Organized by Steel &Metallurgy, Bhubaneswar –Odisha Authors: RatnakarBonda, M.R.Patil, and M.V.Rudramuniyappa
milestones.source_description: International Seminar on 6th Indian Steel Summit Organized by Steel &Metallurgy, Bhubaneswar –Odisha Authors: RatnakarBonda,

milestones.description: 2	Published a research paper entitled “Separation Of Heavy Minerals By Gravity And Also By Flotation Process Of Trimex Sands Private Limited, Srikakulam, Andharapradesh ” at National Seminar on GEOPME  , VSKU P.G. Center, Nandihallisandur Authors: Ratnaka
